name: Aananya T
bio: Aananya is a Developer Experience Engineer at Kubric. She is a strong believer of the principle “Lift as you climb”. Loves Idlis and is driven by empathy. Talk to her about Code, Community & Creativity

name: Poornima S
bio: Poornima is a passionate software engineer, Data science enthusiast, Currently working as a business executive at Glaubetech. She loves to organize tech events and lead the community. Being an #IamRemarkable facilitator she enjoys to help others to be confident and passionate about what they are. Apart from tech, she is a lover of books, enjoys travelling.

name: Tayba wasim
bio: Tayba is a technically enthusiastic person who loves to play with data. Freelancer , Dreamer and living with the belief that Faith can move mountains, She aims to create a platform that can facilitate bringing together of technically enthusiastic women.

name: Mansi Jain
bio: I'm Mansi Jain kind of enthusiastic and personal drived person with my set of goals to accomplish.I am a Competitive coder, programming head at my Institute, Full stack developer intern at Kanishka IT Pvt Ltd, Mobile developer:)

name: Savvy Jain
bio: Savvy loves data and everything around it. She used to be a data scientist and has experience working in various domains. She is currently CEO and Founder of Cofiato, which is a Hardware Intelligence firm. Her second love is community evangelism. She's associated with many technical and networking communities like GDG, GCDC, WTM, Linkedin Local, etc. She is also Women in Data Science Regional Ambassador. She likes innovation, creativity, and coffee.

name: Punita Ojha
bio: Punita Ojha is a full-stack web developer at Sanskrut Corporation. She is skilled in technologies like Angular JS, Python, Google Cloud, etc. She is an organizer of GDG Udaipur and WTM Udaipur. She is also a machine learning enthusiast, she has pursued her Machine Learning Engineer Nanodegree From Udacity and loves to spend her free time playing around with models. She loves inspiring newbies into Technology by bringing them together via events, peer programming sessions, tech talks, code labs, and different activities.

name: Annapurna Agrawal
bio: Annapurna is a full stack developer. Currently, she is working on creating technical educational content online with various platforms. She believes in sharing experiences and learning. She is an organiser at google developer group and Women Techmaker Ambassador, working to nurture local tech enthusiats. She is also facilitator for #IamRemarkable program.

name: Vinothini Balasubramanian
bio: Experienced Data Analyst with a demonstrated history of working in the IT services industry. Skilled in Off shore/Onsite Model,Team Management,Support services,Event organizing skills,Strong motivation to build up my career in Digital Industry.

name: Mounica Narkedamilli
bio: I am a Data Scientist with an International Research experience at Nanyang Technological University, Singapore. Skilled in Neural Networks, Deep learning, Machine learning, Statistics, Data Visualization, Problem solving, and Programming.

name: Prachi Durge
bio: Prachi loves to build apps, especially working with Android and Flutter.

name: Padmapriya R
bio: Padmapriya is a software test Engineer. She likes to share her knowledge with others. She always wanted to empower girls who comes from underrepresented background. She mentors students to get into a good company by teaching them the technical knowledge which industries expects right now. She is running a MakerWomen platform which is dedicated for women of all age group to solve a real world problem together. She likes to travel and exploring new places and its culture. She is a WTM Ambassador for Madurai city.

name: Shilpa Garg
bio: Shilpa is a Software Engineer presently working in the field of Machine Learning(NLP). She is a Tech Speaker, Google MLCC Facilitator, python mentor at 1 million Women to Tech by Oxford Entreprenurers & presently working as Lead AI Consultant in Edtech. Company, with a total experience of 5+ years in the Industry. She is organiser of GDG New Delhi & WTM Ambassador as well. She loves community building, Innovation and empowering Women in Tech.

name: Ananya R
bio: Ananya is an Associate software engineer who has a keen interest in design and development.  .She is the WTM ambassador and Co-organizer of GDG Trivandrum and also an #IamRemarkable facilitator. She is a responsible volunteer who takes part in different community programs with aplomb. She is an opportunist & optimistic personality who loves to explore & learn.

name: Bhavani Ravi
bio: Bhavani Ravi is working as a Senior Software Engineer, building Python applications for the past 5+ years. She is also an Open Source Contributor for  Pandas, Rasa, and Airflow She has spoken at international conferences. She is also a Linkedin Instructor with her course on Chatbots with Azure.

name: Varsha Jaiswal
bio: Enthusiasm to Learn' defines Varsha in a nutshell. Aiming towards a goal and making continuous effort to achieve it is what she believes. She is a girl who puts thinking into each step towards giving back to the community by sharing the knowledge with everyone who is in the quest for it. Working as a Software Engineer, she has keen interest in working on new technologies. Despite busy schedules, she never miss an opportunity to help, guide, travel and eat.

name: Geeta Kakrani
bio: CEO at Kanishka Information Technology

name: Priyal Jain
bio: I am UI developer and keen to learn new things, explore about new technologies and challenges. Also, love to contribute in open source communities. Enthusiast tech lover, community lover, dreamer and achiever.

name: Amalu Susan Santhosh
bio: Amalu is a desi product girl who hails from Kerala, India. She loves plants, books & to think about “Why” factor in products . She helps others learn to engage in communities, come out of their comfort zones and encourage people to push their boundaries.

name: Namrata More
bio: Namrata is a Women TechMakers Ambassador Pune, a product enthusiast, fond of design and UX, exploring tech and love to be around communities, sharing and acquiring knowledge being a mentor, a lead, an ambassador and a blogger

name: Dhara Vihol
bio: The passionate, enthu-learner and developer who is a huge fan and follower of the open-source and like to contribute to the community in every possible way. believes in "Learning never ends".

name: Vrijraj Singh
bio: Vrijraj is a front-end developer by profession and a community champion by passion. He is an organizer for GDG Jalandhar and a Google Developers Expert for Firebase and Web Technologies.He has given 80+ talks and workshops for communities over the past 5 years. His areas of expertise are around Web, Firebase, Google Cloud Platform, and UI/UX Design. He is always eager to learn new technologies and develop solutions based on them. He enjoys mentoring people and  nurturing communities. Outside work, he is a foodie and enjoys watching YouTube videos.

name: Ramya Kappagantu
bio: Ramya believes communication and collaboration are the key elements for success, hence leading the community with the same belief for the past 1 year. She launched Women Techmakers Nagpur with the only motive to create a safe place which is available and accessible to every woman interested in technology and empowerment. She also facilitates #IamRemarkable workshops to improve self-promotion skills and develop the art of story-telling. She currently works as a Software Engineer at Oracle.

name: Dhruva Shastri
bio: Dhruva works as a Spin Doctor at '3 Sided Coin' to establish branding and corporate relations. Her interests as an inquisitive #WomenInTech is to learn new every day so she continually look out for areas that interest her to work on. Currently exploring Flutter development with an inclination towards ux design in leisure time. Being a community passionate playing a role as an Ambassador at WTM Ahmedabad and a gold facilitator for #IamRemarkable initiative, enthusiast about emboldening underrepresented people in every sphere of their life and enjoys people’s synergy.

name: Priya A. Tiru
bio: Priya manages the GDG & WTM Chapter of Hubli. She is also a data enthusiast who loves playing around with data. Apart from this she loves food, photography and poetry too!

name: Supriya S
bio: Supriya is a huge tech enthusiast who loves to learn new technologies. Working with fellow members of the community to build a thriving tech community is the ultimate joy she believes. Her tech forte is Reactjs and frontend technologies. She loves to code, read books, travel, play badminton and is always up for anything thrown her way.

name: Dhivya Krishna
bio: WRITER | Former TEDxSKCET licensee | Public speaker | Psychologist | An IT Engineer | Social Activist | SEO Specialist | Content marketing |  Digital marketing | Interviewee | Host

name: Vandana Pv
bio: Vandana is a Full Stack Developer who is working on Conversational AI along with web apps and cloud services in building the next best AI solutions. She is also an Ambassador of WTM Hyderabad who is always passionate about bringing more women to technology where she guides them by sharing her knowledge through blogs, public speaking, and open source contributions. You can find her playing guitar, or practicing calligraphy in her free time.

name: Aditi Soni
bio: Aditi is a community lover and a passionate developer. She keeps contributing to various technical communities as an organizer or a speaker. As a personal interest, she develops mobile Applications. She is also a Google India Udacity Android Developers Nanodegree 2018 Scholar. Reading about new inventions and breakthroughs keeps her motivated. She always tries to empower women with the power of community to help women achieve the things they aim for. Happiness is a choice and she strongly believes that one should always keep the child inside them alive.

name: Riya Guha Thakurta
bio: Riya is an Associate Software Engineer working with Johnson Controls. She believes in contributing towards community and sharing knowledge with others to solve their problems, which leads her to serve for her regional community as a WomenTechmakers Ambassador and Co-organizer of Google Developers Group Kolkata.Being an Intel Software Innovator she looks forward to share her expertise which thrives to innovation and would be helpful for tech enthusiasts to build solution in IoT.She love programming and applying her skills to solve real life problems and make life smarter.

name: Lakshya Sivaramakrishnan
bio: Lakshya manages the Women Techmakers Program in India. She is a data science enthusiast building tech expertise in Machine Learning and Google Cloud. She enjoys nurturing communities and empowering more women to join, thrive and lead in the tech industry.
